utils.auth

Class SpaceToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.auth.SpaceToken

  • public class SpaceToken
extends java.lang.Object
    Authorization token for plugins to access a user's records assigned to a space.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.bson.types.ObjectId pluginId
      optional id of plugin
      org.bson.types.ObjectId recordId
      optional id of record if only access to a single record is allowed
      org.bson.types.ObjectId spaceId
      id of space
      org.bson.types.ObjectId userId
      id of user
